name: Disk N Back
description:
VimJam entry.

A mobile device oriented game where you need to throw a disk get a key item and return to the starting area.

DISCLAIMER: There is a bug with the line used to show the trajectory.

How to play:

- Click in the screen to select in which direction you want to throw the frisbee, the disk will launch at release.

- There are powerups that add an extra bounce "+1"
